column5: I never received confirmation of my booking with Supremo Holiday. What should I do?
column6: Thank you for contacting us, John. Please provide your booking reference or email used, and we will urgently verify the status of your confirmation.

column5: Is airport pickup included in my holiday package?
column6: Hi Jessica, airport pickup is included in our Standard and Premium packages. Please provide your booking number and we will confirm the details for your reservation.

column5: How can I request a vegetarian meal for my trip?
column6: Hello Marcus, you can request special meal preferences through your customer portal, or reply to this thread and we'll update your preferences.

column5: My flight was cancelled and no one has contacted me yet.
column6: We apologize for this inconvenience, Lucy. We are contacting our airline partners and will provide rebooking options for you as soon as possible.

column5: What is the check-in time at the resort?
column6: Dear Liam, most resorts allow check-in from 3:00 PM. If you wish to arrive earlier, please let us know so we can request an early check-in.

column5: I lost my luggage upon arrival. Can Supremo Holiday assist?
column6: Hi Amelia, sorry to hear about your luggage. Please provide your luggage claim details and airline reference, and our support team will coordinate with the airline on your behalf.

column5: The hotel room does not match what was advertised. What can be done?
column6: Dear Oliver, please send us photos or details of the discrepancies, and we will liaise with the hotel management to resolve this or offer a room change.

column5: Are there any recommended local restaurants?
column6: Hi Emily, we're glad to help! Our local guide will send you a curated list of popular spots based on your preferences.

column5: How can I reschedule my city tour?
column6: Hello Ethan, to reschedule, kindly reply with your preferred date and time. We'll confirm availability and send you an update shortly.

column5: I was overcharged for my transfer from the airport to the hotel.
column6: Dear Chloe, we apologize for any inconvenience. Please share your receipt. We'll promptly review and arrange any necessary refund.

column5: What is included in the all-inclusive package?
column6: Hi Benjamin, the all-inclusive package typically covers meals, non-alcoholic drinks, select excursions, and transfers. Detailed inclusions are available in your booking summary.

column5: Can I get a late check-out option?
column6: Dear Sophia, late check-out is subject to availability. Would you like us to make the request for your reservation?

column5: The pool was closed during my stay. Can I get compensation?
column6: Hi Ava, we're sorry for the pool closure during your holiday. We'll review your complaint and check with the hotel management for possible compensation.

column5: My airport transfer was delayed and I missed an event.
column6: Dear William, we sincerely apologize for the transfer delay. Please provide event details. We'll investigate and see how we can remedy the situation.

column5: How do I update my emergency contact details?
column6: Hi Mia, you can update this in the customer portal or reply here with the new contact so we can update it for you.

column5: Do I need travel insurance for my trip with Supremo Holiday?
column6: Hello Noah, while not mandatory, we strongly recommend travel insurance for all bookings to cover any unforeseen circumstances.

column5: The guided tour guide never showed up.
column6: Dear Lily, apologies for this experience. We are reaching out to our local tour operator and will offer an alternative tour or suitable compensation.

column5: How can I add an extra night to my current booking?
column6: Hi James, please let us know your preferred dates for the extra night, and we'll send an updated booking proposal.

column5: Can you help me get museum tickets in advance?
column6: Hello Isabella, yes! Please provide the museum name and preferred dates, and our team will arrange the tickets for you.

column5: Where can I exchange currency near my hotel?
column6: Hi Mason, there are several authorized currency exchange offices nearby. We'll send you a list with their operating hours.

column5: I have a severe nut allergy. Can this be communicated to all restaurants?
column6: Dear Sophie, absolutely. We'll notify your hotel and included restaurants of your dietary requirements to ensure your safety.

column5: My return airport transfer did not arrive on time and I almost missed my flight.
column6: Dear Logan, our sincerest apologies. We're investigating and will offer support and compensation if appropriate.

column5: Are excursions suitable for young children?
column6: Hello Harper, many of our excursions are family-friendly. Please let us know your children's ages so we can recommend suitable options.

column5: Is my room wheelchair accessible?
column6: Hi Jacob, we will confirm accessibility features with the hotel and update you on your specific booking.

column5: I became ill during my trip and the local medical assistance was insufficient.
column6: Dear Grace, we're very sorry for your experience. Can you provide details about what happened, so we can follow-up with the provider and assist as best as possible?

column5: What time is breakfast served at the hotel?
column6: Hello Elijah, breakfast is typically served from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM at most hotels, but we will confirm for yours.

column5: I haven't received my travel itinerary yet.
column6: Hi Charlotte, sorry for the delay. We'll resend your complete itinerary to your email within the next hour.

column5: There was construction noise near my hotel room at night.
column6: Dear Jack, thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the disruption and will discuss with hotel management to ensure quieter arrangements or possible compensation.

column5: Do you offer travel packages for solo travelers?
column6: Hi Ella, yes, we have several specially curated packages for solo travelers. Let us know your destination interests!

column5: How do I arrange airport lounge access?
column6: Hello Alexander, please let us know your airline and travel class, and we'll advise on your options for airport lounge access.

column5: The driver for my excursion was rude and unprofessional.
column6: Dear Zoe, we regret your experience. We will escalate this with our local partner and follow up regarding corrective measures.

column5: What is the cancellation policy for excursions?
column6: Hi Henry, most excursions can be canceled up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund. Specific policies will be detailed in your booking confirmation.

column5: Do you offer travel insurance options directly?
column6: Hi Scarlett, currently we don't provide in-house travel insurance, but we can recommend trusted providers if needed.

column5: My suite was not clean on arrival.
column6: Dear Daniel, our apologies for the inconvenience. We have notified the housekeeping team and a supervisor will visit your suite to resolve this promptly.

column5: Can I use public transportation passes included in my package?
column6: Hi Evelyn, depending on your package, city transport passes may be included. We'll check your booking and confirm.

column5: My booking includes a spa treatment. How can I schedule it?
column6: Hello Luke, please share your preferred time slots and we'll reserve the spa treatment for you.

column5: My room safe was not working and my valuables felt unsafe.
column6: Dear Penelope, we apologize for this. We can have technical staff repair the safe immediately or offer secure storage at reception.

column5: How much luggage is allowed with Supremo Holiday packages?
column6: Hi Jackie, luggage allowance depends on your airline, but most holiday packages include one checked bag and one carry-on. Check your airline ticket for specifics.

column5: Are evening meals included in my half-board package?
column6: Hi Vincent, half-board generally includes breakfast and dinner, but please refer to your booking details or let us know your hotel name for confirmation.

column5: Your driver left us stranded after a day trip.
column6: Dear Anna, we sincerely apologize for this distressing event. We will urgently investigate and arrange a goodwill gesture to make amends.

column5: Is there free Wi-Fi at all the hotels you work with?
column6: Hi Samuel, most hotels we partner with offer complimentary Wi-Fi. We will confirm the details for your specific reservation.

column5: How do I arrange a late-night airport pickup?
column6: Hello Victoria, simply provide your flight details and arrival time. Our team will coordinate a driver for your late-night arrival.

column5: I need urgent help: I lost my passport while traveling.
column6: Dear Levi, please contact the local embassy or consulate immediately, and let us know your location so our local representative can assist you in person.

column5: Are pets allowed at my hotel?
column6: Hi Sofia, we'll check with your hotel regarding their pet policy and update you as soon as we get confirmation.

column5: Are there any special events during my stay?
column6: Hello Layla, please let us know your destination and dates, and we'll provide a schedule of local events and activities.

column5: Supremo Holiday promised a sea view, but my room faces the street.
column6: Dear David, apologies for this oversight. We'll contact the hotel and try to arrange a room with the correct view or offer an alternative solution.

column5: Can I get help booking tickets for a local concert?
column6: Hi Chloe, absolutely! Please provide concert details and desired ticket category, and we'll assist with the booking process.

column5: My holiday agency voucher code isn't working on your website.
column6: Hello Matthew, sorry for the trouble. Please share the voucher code, and we'll investigate and help you apply it successfully.

column5: I have a serious medical condition and need access to emergency services at my destination.
column6: Dear Emily, thank you for informing us. We'll coordinate with your accommodation to ensure access to nearby medical services and can provide emergency contacts.

column5: Does Supremo Holiday arrange travel insurance for customers?
column6: Hi Ryan, we do not currently provide insurance directly but can guide you to reputable insurers if required.

column5: What is the maximum amount Supremo Holiday can reimburse for a cancelled holiday ?
What is the maximum amount Supremo Holiday can reimburse for a lost luggage ?
